page.title: 14LOCAL NEWS
page.content: { Horrabridge}is not very often on T.V. or in the newspaper. There are three local newspapers.The{Tavistock Times is out on Friday,the{Tavistock Gazette on a Wednesday,while the{Western {Morning News}is published every day exept Sunday. Some issues reported affect people in Horrabridge like the job loses at {Devonport Dockyard,}in Plymouth where 2,000 people will be made redundant. Defence Secretary,{Michael Heseltine decided to come down to see the Dockyard.The Dockyard workers, some of whom come from Horrabridge staged a peaceful sit down demonstration. Quite often local people are mentioned because they do something of interest, like the{Grenofen}Squash professional who got to the finals of the{National Squash Championships.
